channel.title: computer on Ben Mezger
channel.description: Recent content in computer on Ben Mezger

item.title: Notes on RISC-V CPU HARD IP Cores enter SoC FPGAs
item.description: tags RISCV Computer Architecture Notes on RISC-V CPU HARD IP Cores enter SoC FPGAs presentation Frozen base ISA Consolidation in the semiconductor industry RISC-V is not owned by anyone Custom instruction extension to extend the virtuous cycle of semiconductor innovation PolarFire SoC - RISC-V enabled innocation platform # Mixed critically RTOS + Linux support Defence grade security Exceptional reliability Designed for low-power L2 memory subsystem Can be made to be deterministic Not all L2 are deterministic
